name: Dicy Dodges
description:
Just try to stay on the plateform as long as possible !

Controls : Use WASD to move arround, and that's it !

3d assets : not me (Synty Polygon Prototype)

Sound effects : not me (Ultimate SFX Bundle (2020) - Ultimate Retro Sounds)

Music : not me (ArcadeJam - Cyberleaf-The8BitJukebox)

VFX : not me (Sci-Fi Arsenal)

Code : me actually

Made during the GMTK 2022 game-jam in solo.
